title: Launching CSAI 2025
excerpt: Welcome to a new year of projects, workshops, and hack nights.
html: We’re kicking off the year with a fresh site, new project tracks, and a packed event calendar. Stay tuned!

title: Project Spotlight: Smart Attendance
excerpt: How we built privacy-friendly attendance using on-device ML.
html: We prototyped a lightweight, privacy-first attendance system. In this post we walk through architecture, models, and results.
